sense.def:
Kadar je neka stvar
above another one
je neposredno nad drugo stvarjo ali više od nje.

seg.quote: A noise was coming from the bedroom above.

sense.def:
Z besedo
above
pri pisanju označujemo nekaj, kar je bilo že prej omenjeno.

seg.quote: All the above items can be obtained from Selfridges.
The above is a fair description of teaching machines.

sense.def:
Kadar je neka količina ali mera
above a particular level
je večja od določene ravni.

Kadar je nekdo
above someone
ima višji položaj od tistega človeka.

seg.quote: He will have an executive above him to whom he reports.

sense.def:
Kadar človek misli, da je
above a particular activity
določene dejavnosti ne mara in se noče ukvarjati z njo.

seg.quote: They consider themselves above such mercenary transactions.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
above criticism or suspicion
ga zaradi njegovih dobrih lastnosti ali položaja ni mogoče kritizirati ali sumničiti.

seg.quote: ...those whose loyalty and morals were above reproach.
